creator: joel@elserver.com
text:
Please move this to the correct section if it does not belong here.

We've upgraded to 1.3.29 tu get rid of the defunct problem that showed up in 
1.3.28

but in some cases we are still getting defunct, particularly under high loads 
we get as much as 500 php defunct processes with 1500 httpd running.

has anyone experienced something similar ?

apache 1.3.29+mod_ssl+mod_casp2
